main event: A retired physicist observed a round, shiny object in Clarksburg, W. Virginia for a few minutes before it took off at a high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as shiny and reflective like the sun,The object was seen on two different days in the same location,No physical evidence or photographs were documented in the report,The witness emphasized the object was not a conventional aircraft,The sighting occurred around 11:02.
